title: Burt's Bees Intense Hydration Treatment Mask, 4 Ounce
Burt's Bees: Citrus Facial Scrub, 2 oz
description: Burt's Bees Citrus Facial Scrub.2 oz (57g).

title: Burt's Bees Acne Pore Refining Scrub, 4 Ounce Tube
description: This deep cleansing scrub is clinically proven to exfoliate dead skin cells while refining the appearance of pores without over-drying or irritating skin. Salicylic Acid, derived naturally from Willow Bark Extract, penetrates deep into pores to help reduce acne and prevent future breakouts. Formulated with Jojoba Beads and a natural fruit acid complex, this scrub gently exfoliates. Giving you refined, clear and smooth skin.

title: Burt's Bees Intense Hydration Day Lotion, 1.8 Ounce
Burt's Bees Sensitive Daily Moisturizing Cream, 1.8 Ounces
description: Clinically proven to moisturize sensitive skin all day without causing redness or irritation, this nourishing day cream is formulated with softening Cotton Extract to help skin replenish its outer layer and minimize the effects of potential irritants such as harsh soaps or cleansers, all while Rice Extract moisturizes and Aloe soothes your skin. Naturally gentle for daily use. Use this 99% natural facial cream as part of the Burt’s Bees® Sensitive skin care regimen. Put the power of nature to work for your skin with Burt’s Bees.

title: Burt's Bees Sensitive Facial Cleanser, 6 Fluid Ounces
description: This soap-free cream cleanser is clinically proven to moisturize sensitive skin while gently cleansing away dirt, oil and make-up without over drying or causing redness. Distinctly formulated with softening Cotton Extract to help skin replenish its outer layer and minimize the effects of potential irritants such as harsh soaps or cleansers, it also moisturizes with Rice Extract and soothes with Aloe. Naturally gentle and skin-friendly for daily use Use it every day as part of the Burt’s Bees® Sensitive skin care regimen. Put the power of nature to work for your skin with Burt’s Bees.
